Text: Greeley Contracts Cc Paul Have you heard anything from Gerald about the contracts The deal is almost over and we still do not have any contracts executed Hope you can get this thing unstruck and moving forward again Robert

RE Young StorageThersa The ending balance in Young Storage per the plan is MMBtu The beginning balance per plan at May st was MMBtu The total injections per the plan are MMBtu Robert Original Message From Staab Theresa mailto Sent Thursday September AM To Subject Young Storage Robert What is the volume we need to have in storage by the end of October and does that include your beginning balance We just want to make sure were on the right track Thanks Theresa This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Young Storage Status Cc Paul Thersa I need to check on the status of the Young Storage field I need to update John on where the phyisical balances are in that field I sent you emails concerning the scheduled maitaince CIG is doing with that field in August Could you please send me the Young Storage summary in the Young Storage invoice for June What is your expected balance at July st If you could please send me that information as soon as possible I would appreciate it ThanksRobert

RE Young Storage StatusThersa I have not spoken to CIG directly about the maintaince I was making sure that everyone was in the loop concerning any CIG business that could have an impact on Young Storage The messages I received talked about Ft Morgan Storage Facility Did not know if FTMorgan and Young were seperate facilities or one in the same Robert Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday July AM To Poole Jr Robert W Cc Hack John W Subject Re Young Storage Status Robert I will fax you the invoice for Young Storage right now I understood from Julie Adams at CIG that Young Storage should not be affected by the maintenance in August Is that your understanding Let me know if you need further information Thanks Theresa Poole Jr Robert W To Robert tmose nergycom cc Hack John W Subject Invoice WorksheetTheresa I have checked out April but still working on May and June Enron Invoice Checkxls Give me a call later in the week I will try to work on cleaning up May and June this week Robert Enron Invoice Checkxls

RE InvoicesThersa The last injection plan I sent was April May June July August September October These are injections delivered into Young Storage Robert Original Message From Staab Theresa mailto Sent Monday October AM To Poole Jr Robert W Subject RE Invoices Robert Im working on this right now What do you show as the storage schedule I have different ones I know you changed it I just want to make sure were both on the same schedule Ill just make sure my volumes on storage match with the schedule and then I can send them all to you Thanks Theresa Original Message From Poole Jr Robert W mailto Sent Monday October AM To Staab Theresa Subject Invoices Thersa Can you send me your revisions with the discounted price and commodity charges applied to the planned storage injections today or tomorrow I really need that ASAP to see if our numbers are getting any closer I believe that the fuel calculations are being taken into account for the planned storage injections for the whole path from CIG through WIC and into Young Storage I was planning on calling you after I saw your revisions ThanksRobert This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

InvoicesThersa Can you send me your revisions with the discounted price and commodity charges applied to the planned storage injections today or tomorrow I really need that ASAP to see if our numbers are getting any closer I believe that the fuel calculations are being taken into account for the planned storage injections for the whole path from CIG through WIC and into Young Storage I was planning on calling you after I saw your revisions ThanksRobert

Invoice ReconcilationThersa I changed the CIG fuel rate to for AprilMay and June for July and August Can you put in your revisions for the discounted planned storage volumes and commodity rates then send me your revisions today ThanksRobert

Contracts and Young StoragePaul and Thersa Needed to check on a couple of things before I get to far into November Paul have you heard or seen anything from Gerald in the contracts I would think that the contracts would be a mode point at this stage since the deal ended Would you please check with your people and get back to me on the status of these contracts and documents still floating around Thersa I need to know what the phyiscal balance for Young Storage is at Can you send me the balance and the Young Storage invoice for October I need to know the storage balance as soon as possible You should have that before the invoice arrives ThanksRobert

Enron InvoicesTheresa Attached is the worksheets I use to breakdown your worksheet into gas commodity costs and transportation costs Enron Invoice Checkxls Talk to you guys at CST Robert Enron Invoice Checkxls

Invoice WorksheetTheresa I have checked out April but still working on May and June Enron Invoice Checkxls Give me a call later in the week I will try to work on cleaning up May and June this week Robert Enron Invoice Checkxls

RE Revised AugustThersa I recalculated the August invoice and I am still coming up with a difference between your invoice and my calculations The difference for August is I am issuing a adjustment for the So when the funds are transferred to Enron there will be two transactions that will net Also I am not paying the additional PPA for July When you revise Julys invoice I will pay based on the revised invoice I will take the invoices down to Accounting tomorrow after they have been approved John is out today but will be back in the office tomorrow I will try to expedite payment tomorrow Can you please forward this to Valerie Robert Original Message From Staab Theresa mailto Sent Monday September PM To Vela Valerie Subject Revised August Robert Valerie I have revised the fuel percent from to Please call me if you have any questions Thanks Theresa I will start working on correcting all prior months and get an adjustment out soon Greeley Gas August Revised xls This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
